content:
What generates https://doc.rust-lang.org?

There is a bug where it doesn't seem to escape angluar brakcets in the documentation and if you have <S> then it begins the strikethrough tag.

eg: https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_middle/ty/struct.List.html#impl-HashStable%3CStableHashingContext%3C%27a%3E%3E
I'm pretty sure this is straight from rustdoc, it should definitely escape HTML tags but in this case it would be better to use a code block anyway
@Aman Arora can you file an issue on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/ ? Feel free to tag me, I'm @jyn514
I donâ€™t think its a bug, well, at least the fact that <s> is emitted. It is valid and desirable to allow fairly arbitrary html in markdown.
I went ahead and closed this as a duplicate of another issue as referenced in comments. Thanks!
